title: A Family moves camp and gathers food (A)
creator_contributor_role: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indigenous peoples - Social life and customs
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Deserts - Australia
description: Episode number 4 of Series "People of the Australian western desert (A)". Filmed in May 1965 in the Desert Sandhill country of the Western Desert, the film documents a group of Aboriginal families still living their traditional way of life. Shows them moving camp, hunting and gathering.
related_objects: Series; S00570; People of the Australian western desert (A); Active; 1970
